:py:mod:`CodonU.file_handler.internal_comp`
===========================================

.. py:module:: CodonU.file_handler.internal_comp


Module Contents
---------------


Functions
~~~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   CodonU.file_handler.internal_comp.set_entrez_email
   CodonU.file_handler.internal_comp.set_entrez_api_key
   CodonU.file_handler.internal_comp.is_file_empty
   CodonU.file_handler.internal_comp.is_file
   CodonU.file_handler.internal_comp.is_file_writeable



.. py:function:: set_entrez_email(email: Optional[str]) -> None

   Sets Bio.Entrez.email parameter to given email

   :param email: Email of user
   :raises EmailWarning: If no email is provided


.. py:function:: set_entrez_api_key(api_key: Optional[str]) -> None

   Sets Bio.Entrez.api_key parameter to given api_key

   :param api_key: API key of the user
   :raises ApiWarning: If no API key is provided


.. py:function:: is_file_empty(path: str) -> bool

   Checks if an existing file is empty

   :param path: Path to the file
   :return: True if empty else false
   :raises FileNotEmptyError: If the given file to write is not empty


.. py:function:: is_file(path: str) -> bool

   Checks if file exists or not

   :param path: Path to the file
   :return: True if exists else False


.. py:function:: is_file_writeable(path: str)
